definition: of textiles, a rough loosely woven fabric originally made with yarn that was spun at home
details:
adjective
- of textiles
= synonyms: tight
- made of cloth spun or woven in the home
= example: made of cloth spun or woven in the home
- characteristic of country life
= synonyms: folksy, cracker-barrel
noun
- a rough loosely woven fabric originally made with yarn that was spun at home
